news1.text1: Use innovative approaches in educating the future generation! We invite pedagogues to work in specialized schools. Document acceptance: from July 1st
news1.title2: ATTENTION TO APPLICANTS WHO APPLIED TO SPECIALIZED SCHOOLS IN THE AGENCY SYSTEM!
news1.text2: Entrance exams for these schools within the quota will be conducted in one stage, for grades 5-10 in exact sciences direction and for grades 7-10 in natural sciences direction.
news1.title3: IN THE SYSTEM OF THE AGENCY OF SPECIALIZED EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS
news1.text3: The deadline for submitting documents for the 2025/2026 academic year to: ‚ûñ Presidential schools; ‚ûñ Creative schools; ‚ûñ Sports schools; ‚ûñ Specialized schools ends in 3 days.
